name: Attic Cult
description:
It's spring cleaning and you decide to throw out some old boxes filled with your childhood toys, but you find yourself trapped in the attic and those scary stories your grandpa told you fills your mind.

Attic Cult is a one-man-made short VR experience with a hint of horror and a dash of creepy.

Dear YouTuber, if you make a video / let's play with this game, please leave a link in the description of your video to this page. Thank you.

Internet Connection:

not required

Controllers:

not required

Minimum System Requirement:

  • Oculus Rift / Rift S
  • CPU Intel i5-7400
  • 4GB RAM
  • NVIDIA GTX 1050/AMD RX560
